_sText:
Ze_MkZk_Scarab_v4

Single stage map.
Playtime around 10 minutes.
Difficulty increases with number of players.

Large ancient underground structure consisting of barely lit rooms, dark tunnels, and narrow corridors.

Littered with countless vicious traps, dangerous obstacles, and difficult passages.
Depictions of blue scarab beetles act as warning signs (with 2-3 minor exceptions). Mindless steps of one survivor can endanger the entire team.

Divided into more than 20 sectors, most have only one way, some offer multiple ways. Each sector becomes accessible through a teleporter positioned at the main spawn as soon as the survivors reach the next sector.

Requires flashlight to be enabled, some things are hidden in the shadows.

Can be played in offline/sigleplayer mode as well, does not require teammates or zombies to work properly.

Fixed and optimized V4

V3: ze_MkZk_Scarab_v3

  • Reworked skybox-issue
  • Changed sound-file to .mp3
  • Slightly changed some lighting
  • Several small changes in brushwork

If there are things to fix or ideas for improvement let me know!
